content.text: 2 pounds Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and thinly sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 pounds Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and thinly sliced" )
( ing-7 "1/2 cup packed light brown sugar" )
( ing-8 "1/4 cup butter, cut into pieces" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.) Butter an 8 inch square baking dish.
1) In a large bowl, mix together apples, cranberries, white sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "apples"@33:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cranberries"@41:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "white sugar"@54:65 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cinnamon"@67:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "nutmeg"@80:86 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) In the same bowl, combine oats, flour and brown sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "combine"@21:28 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "oats"@29:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "flour"@35:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "brown sugar"@45:56 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "the same bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) With a fork, mix in butter until crumbly.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "mix in"@16:22 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "butter"@23:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-4-0 "a fork"@8:14 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until crumbly"@30:43 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir in pecans. Sprinkle over apples.
6) Bake in preheated oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until topping is golden brown, and apples are tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "preheated oven"@11:25 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "40 to 50 minutes"@30:46 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until topping is golden brown, and apples are tender"@51:103 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
